name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadGenius - Lightweight Immersive Reading Tool With AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ReadGenius is a lightweight immersive reading tool that uses AI technology to convert any page content into Markdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
===== English =====

ReadGenius - Redefine Your Web Reading Experience!

ğŸš€ Key Features:

â€¢ HTML to Markdown: One-click conversion from messy web pages to clear Markdown
â€¢ AI Smart Summary: Quickly grasp core content
â€¢ Custom Content Selection: Precisely extract needed information
â€¢ Multi-language Support: Seamless switch between English and Chinese
â€¢ Sidebar Functionality: Conveniently manage saved articles
â€¢ Full-screen Reading Mode: Immersive reading experience
â€¢ Local Storage: Support offline reading, protect privacy
â€¢ Custom Styles: Personalize your reading preferences
â€¢ Code Highlighting: A must-have tool for programmers
â€¢ Can export and import Markdown

ğŸ¯ Who's it for:

Students, researchers, professionals, information workers, tech enthusiasts... Anyone who needs to efficiently acquire and manage online information!

ğŸŒŸ Why Choose ReadGenius?

â€¢ Simplify complex web pages, improve reading efficiency
â€¢ AI-assisted, quickly understand article key points
â€¢ Personalized settings, create your exclusive reading space
â€¢ Local storage, read worry-free anytime, anywhere

ğŸ“š Let ReadGenius be your smart reading assistant, and start a new web reading experience!

Install ReadGenius now and enjoy smart, efficient, and pleasant reading time!
